title: Given f(x), how many points of inflection?

content.prompt: The derivative of the function f is given by f′(x) = x2cos(x2). How many points of inflection does the graph of f have on the open interval (−2, 2)?

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
